tables.name: secret_block_events
tables.description: This table provides a detailed record of all events that occurred on the Cosmos blockchain, including block height, timestamp, and event type. It offers a comprehensive view of the blockchain's activity and evolution.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain, uniquely identifying each block.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created on the blockchain.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the block.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred, which can be used to categorize and analyze the data.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional attributes related to the event, providing more context and information.

columns.name: source
columns.description: The source of the data, indicating which blockchain or node provided the information.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to structure and organize the data.

tables.name: secret_blocks
tables.description: This table contains information about blocks in the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem, providing insights into block heights, timestamps, and other relevant metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain, indicating its position in the chain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created, measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the Cosmos blockchain network, distinguishing it from other networks.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: The address of the validator that proposed the block for inclusion in the blockchain.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: A hash of the validators that participated in the block's validation process.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block data was ingested into the system, measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: The total number of bytes in all the messages (transactions) included in the block.

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: The total number of transactions (messages) included in the block.

tables.name: secret_message_events
tables.description: This table contains events from blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into network activity and behavior.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction containing the event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the message.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The category or type of event that occurred.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional information about the event, such as sender, recipient, or amount transferred.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to ingest the data.

tables.name: secret_transactions
tables.description: Cosmos Ecosystem Blockchain Transactions. This table contains information about all transactions occurring across various chains in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The ID of the blockchain on which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Additional information about the transaction.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: A log message related to the transaction.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: A memo or note associated with the transaction.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee paid for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: The transaction code or result.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within a block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: The amount of gas used during the transaction.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: The amount of gas requested for the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the transaction was ingested.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to process the transaction.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: The coins used to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: The account that granted the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: The account that paid the transaction fee.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: The maximum amount of gas the transaction was allowed to use.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: Whether the transaction was processed in single sign mode.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: JSON data related to multi- sign transactions.

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: The block height at which the transaction was timed out.

tables.name: secret_tx_messages
tables.description: This table contains a collection of transactions from various blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the blockchain activity over time.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created, which includes the transaction.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the blockchain on which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The type of message within the transaction.

columns.name: message
columns.description: The actual message within the transaction.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to store the transaction data.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: secret_validators
tables.description: This table lists the active and inactive validators in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing essential information for validators and users to make informed decisions.

columns.name: operator_address
columns.description: The address associated with the validator's operator.

columns.name: account_address
columns.description: The address of the validator, which is used for account management and custody.

columns.name: consensus_pubkey
columns.description: The public key used by the validator for consensus and vote casting.

columns.name: jailed
columns.description: A flag indicating whether the validator is currently jailed, meaning it is temporarily unable to participate in the network.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the validator, including active, unbonding, or jailed.

columns.name: tokens
columns.description: The total amount of tokens staked by the validator.

columns.name: moniker
columns.description: The human- readable name or identifier for the validator.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity key of the validator, used for key management and verification.

columns.name: website
columns.description: The validator's official website or contact information.

columns.name: security_contact
columns.description: The contact information for the validator's security team.

columns.name: details
columns.description: Additional details or notes about the validator.

columns.name: unbonding_height
columns.description: The block height at which the validator's unbonding period begins.

columns.name: unbonding_time
columns.description: The duration of the validator's unbonding period.

columns.name: commission_rate
columns.description: The current commission rate charged by the validator.

columns.name: commission_max_rate
columns.description: The maximum commission rate that the validator can charge.

columns.name: commission_max_change_rate
columns.description: The rate at which the validator's commission rate can change.

columns.name: commission_update_time
columns.description: The block height at which the validator's commission rate was last updated.

columns.name: min_self_delegation
columns.description: The minimum amount of tokens that validators must self-delegate.

columns.name: snapshot_height
columns.description: The block height at which the validator's snapshot was taken.

columns.name: snapshot_time
columns.description: The timestamp at which the validator's snapshot was taken.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the validator's data was ingested and recorded.
